SqlConfig.本年支出Sql: select sum(md) from {0}..gl_accvouch where citem_id='{1}' and ccode like '5001%' and dbill_date between '{2}' and '{3}'
SqlConfig.本年借款Sql: select sum(mb) from {0}..gl_accmultiass where iperiod={1} and citem_id='{2}' and (ccode like '121502%' or ccode like '11004%') Union All select SUM(MD)-SUM(MC) from {0}..gl_accvouch where citem_id='{2}' and (ccode like '121502%' or ccode like '11002%') and dbill_date between '{3}' and '{4}'
SqlConfig.以前借款Sql: select sum(mb) from {0}..gl_accmultiass where iperiod={1} and citem_id='{2}' and ccode like '12150304%' Union All select (sum(md)-sum(mc)) from {0}..gl_accvouch where citem_id='{2}' and ccode like '12150304%' and dbill_date between '{3}' and '{4}'
SqlConfig.本年安排Sql: select (sum(mc)-sum(md)) as a,{0} as b from {1}..gl_accvouch where citem_id = '{2}' and ccode like '4001%' and dbill_date between '{3}' and '{4}'
